metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1010302 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.Description:
jhead 3.03 is affected by: Incorrect Access Control. The impact is: Denialof service. The component is: iptc.c Line 122 show_IPTC(). The attackvector is: the victim must open a specially crafted JPEG file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-1010302` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

jhead - 1:3.03-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jhead package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:3.03-2').
